text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

text: We are most alive when we are in love.
author: John Updike

text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

text: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.

text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

text: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.

text: I have found the one whom my soul loves.
author: Song of Solomon 3:4

text: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.

text: In the end, we discover that to love and let go can be the same thing.

text: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. It’s about how much you love each other every day.

text: A life lived in love will never be dull.

text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
